title: Let's Get Real about the Dropout Crisis
content:
My proposal to deal with the High School dropout crisis in the US is now up at Education Week:

[www.edweek.org/ew/articles/2009/06/11/35berkson.h28.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730162840/http:/www.edweek.org/ew/articles/2009/06/11/35berkson.h28.html "www.edweek.org/ew/articles/2009/06/11/35berkson.h28.html")

If you can help make this happen, or have ideas to help, let me know!
author: William Berkson
